department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en: 1. Domain Knowledge and Professional Skill 2. Group experiment for Implementation, Communication and Cooperation 3. Problem Discovery and Solving
goal.ch: 1. 作業練習培養數理邏輯能力 2. 分組實驗實作驗證能力及溝通協調與團隊合作能力 3. 分析與處理問題的能力

content.en:
"1. DC Circuit:
(a) Resistor, Ohm‘s Law
(b) Series Circuits (Kirchhoff‘s Voltage Law)
(c) Parallel Circuits (Kirchhoff‘s Current Law)
(d) Series-Parallel Circuits (Wheatstone Bridge, Thevenin‘s Theorem)
2. AC Circuit:
RC circuit, RL circuit, RLC circuit
3. Semiconductor
Diode, Transistors, Op-Amp"
content.ch:
1. 直流電路:
- 電阻: 歐姆定律
- 串聯電路 (克考夫電壓定律)
- 並聯電路 (克考夫電流定律)
- 串並聯電路 (惠士敦電橋、戴維寧等效)
2. 交流電路:
電阻-電容電路、電阻-電感電路、電阻-電容-電感電路
3. 半導體:
二極體、電晶體、運算放大器

textbook.en: Electronics Fundamentals: Circuits, Devices, and Applications, 8th edition. By Thomas L. Floyd
textbook.ch: Electronics Fundamentals: Circuits, Devices, and Applications, 8th edition. By Thomas L. Floyd

grading.en: Homework 30%, Lab report 30%, Midterm and Final Exams 40%
grading.ch: 作業30%、實驗報告30%、考試(期中、期末)40%

domain.en: 資安、網路、資料庫與系統研究群

en.competency: System Analysis and Solve the Problem

作業練習 ， 實作/實驗

ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗
作業練習 ， 實作/實驗

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 實作/實驗
